channel.title: I need help with a simple code!

item.title: I need help with a simple code!
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Ok I want turn this:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Name Goes Here") || !connectedFrom.equals("127.0.0.1") || !connectedFrom.equals("localhost")) { appendToIPBanned(connectedFrom); disconnected = true;

and turn in into something like this:

if(connectedFrom.equals("*.acanac.net") { appendToIPBanned(connectedFrom); disconnected = true;

I know this is probably way off but I would like anyone who connects from acanac.net to be IP banned.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with a simple code!
